text: This is a list of Gibraltar Premier Division football transfers for the 2016/17 season. Only moves featuring at least one Premier Division club are listed. The transfer window began once clubs had concluded their final domestic fixture of the 2015–16 season, but many transfers will only officially go through on 1 July because the majority of player contracts finish on 30 June.
